Memphis Park

Open dawn to dusk.

Get Here

Memphis Park is located on Front St. between Court and Jefferson.

View on Map

Bike Share

The Explore Bike Share station is located at the south east corner of the park.

Parking

Street Parking available on Court St.

River Garden

Open dawn to dusk.

Get Here

River Garden is located on Riverside Drive between Court and Jefferson.

View on Map

Bike Share

The Explore Bike Share station is located at the south east corner of the park.

Parking

Street parking available on Court St. and at the Tennessee Welcome Center.
